content: प्रबोधन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Awakening, rousing. --नं {@--1@} Waking. {@--2@} Awakening, rousing. {@--3@} Regaining one's consciousness; recovery of senses; <ls>U. 6. 41.</ls> {@--4@} Knowledge, wisdom. {@--5@} Instructing, advising. {@--6@} Reviving the scent of a perfume. {@--7@} Refinement, enlightenment; <ls>Pt. 1.</ls>
प्रबोध(धि)नी The eleventh day of the bright half of Kārtika on which Viṣṇu awakes from his four months' sleep.
